name: The Bad Clicky Game
description:
Why did I make this? - I have no clue. I just setup C++ and Raylib and went to work. (Though I've recently converted it to C# with Raylib bindings)

Why are you updating this? - Because I'd actually like to turn it into a game...one day

Controls:

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - Click the shape :)

RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON - Restart when you lose
